description:
Shopkeeping can be a lonely business. But not anymore with your very own cat companion!

Name and customize your cat to fit you and your shop. Do you like your cat plain and slim or do you prefer a striped chonker? With the Cat Companion DLC you can have your furry friend walking around the shop to keep you company during the long days and late nights.

This DLC adds 3 new objects to the game:
-A cat basket, which will allow you to choose and customize your cat
-A water bowl to keep that purring princess happy
-A food bowl to make that little monster love you even more
name: Winkeltje - Cat Companion
